languages.text: "Наш прежний магус явился тебе во время обряда и повел по ложному следу. Он усыпил твою бдительность, отдав на растерзание малую часть наших сил и пожертвовав собой — так удалось выиграть время, чтобы подготовиться к жатве. Мы устроили аварию лифта, но ты выжил{mf||а}, тогда я почти перехватил тебя там, на магистрали, но снова вмешалась Кровавая паутина. Ты мог{mf||ла} стать частью нас — чего-то великого, настоящего. Но ты все разрушил{mf||а}. Все".

traits.locale_text: "Наш прежний магус явился тебе во время обряда и повел по ложному следу. Он усыпил твою бдительность, отдав на растерзание малую часть наших сил и пожертвовав собой — так удалось выиграть время, чтобы подготовиться к жатве. Мы устроили аварию лифта, но ты выжил{mf||а}, тогда я почти перехватил тебя там, на магистрали, но снова вмешалась Кровавая паутина. Ты мог{mf||ла} стать частью нас — чего-то великого, настоящего. Но ты все разрушил{mf||а}. Все".

languages.text: "Our old Magus appeared to you during the rite and led you on a false trail. He lulled you into a false sense of security by throwing a small portion of our forces to the wolves and sacrificing himself to buy time to prepare for the harvest. We orchestrated the elevator accident, but you survived, and then I almost intercepted you there on the freight line, but the Bloodspun Web interfered again. You could have been part of us — part of something great, something real. But you ruined everything. Everything."
languages.original_text: "Наш прежний магус явился тебе во время обряда и повел по ложному следу. Он усыпил твою бдительность, отдав на растерзание малую часть наших сил и пожертвовав собой — так удалось выиграть время, чтобы подготовиться к жатве. Мы устроили аварию лифта, но ты выжил{mf||а}, тогда я почти перехватил тебя там, на магистрали, но снова вмешалась Кровавая паутина. Ты мог{mf||ла} стать частью нас — чего-то великого, настоящего. Но ты все разрушил{mf||а}. Все".

He lulled you into a false sense of security by throwing a small portion of our forces to the wolves and sacrificing himself to buy time to prepare for the harvest. We orchestrated the elevator accident, but you survived, and then I almost intercepted you there on the freight line, but the Bloodspun Web interfered again. You could have been part of us — part of something great, something real. But you ruined everything. Everything."

You could have been part of us — part of something great, something real. But you ruined everything. Everything."

languages.text: «Nuestro viejo Magus se apareció ante ti durante el ritual para llevarte por la senda equivocada. Te incitó a una seguridad falsa sacrificando una pequeña parte de nuestras fuerzas y su propia vida para ganar tiempo para la cosecha. Organizamos el accidente del ascensor, pero sobreviviste, y después casi consigo interceptarte en la línea de carga, pero la Red Sanguinolenta volvió a interferir. Podrías haber sido parte de esto; de algo grande, de algo verdadero. Pero no: lo has echado todo a perder. Todo».
languages.original_text: "Our old Magus appeared to you during the rite and led you on a false trail. He lulled you into a false sense of security by throwing a small portion of our forces to the wolves and sacrificing himself to buy time to prepare for the harvest. We orchestrated the elevator accident, but you survived, and then I almost intercepted you there on the freight line, but the Bloodspun Web interfered again. You could have been part of us — part of something great, something real. But you ruined everything. Everything."

languages.text: 「我らが老メイガスが儀式の最中に現れ、偽の道筋へと導きました。彼は我が軍のごく一部を狼の餌食とし、収穫の準備の時間を稼ぐために自らを犠牲とすることで、あなた方を偽りの安心感へと導いたのです。エレベーターの事故は我々が仕組んだことですが、陛下は生き延びられた。その後、貨物線で妨害しようとしたものの、ブラッドスパン・ウェブにまた妨害されたのです。陛下も我らの一員になれたはずなのに…偉大なもの、真実の一部に。ですが、すべてを台無しにされた。すべてを」
languages.original_text: "Our old Magus appeared to you during the rite and led you on a false trail. He lulled you into a false sense of security by throwing a small portion of our forces to the wolves and sacrificing himself to buy time to prepare for the harvest. We orchestrated the elevator accident, but you survived, and then I almost intercepted you there on the freight line, but the Bloodspun Web interfered again. You could have been part of us — part of something great, something real. But you ruined everything. Everything."

languages.text: “仪式期间，我们的老教主出现在你面前，将你引到了错误的道路上。他带领我们之中的一小部分战士投身狼群，通过自我牺牲为你们带来了虚假的安全感，也为我们争取到了收获的时间。我们策划了那场电梯事故，但你却活了下来。在那之后，我差点就在货运区域把你截住了，但织血罗网又插手了。你本可以成为我们之中的一员，成为某种伟大、真实之物的一部分，可你却把一切都毁了。全毁了。”
languages.original_text: "Our old Magus appeared to you during the rite and led you on a false trail. He lulled you into a false sense of security by throwing a small portion of our forces to the wolves and sacrificing himself to buy time to prepare for the harvest. We orchestrated the elevator accident, but you survived, and then I almost intercepted you there on the freight line, but the Bloodspun Web interfered again. You could have been part of us — part of something great, something real. But you ruined everything. Everything."

languages.text: "Unser alter Magus ist Euch während des Rituals erschienen, um Euch auf eine falsche Fährte zu locken. Er hat Euch in Sicherheit gewogen, indem er einen kleinen Teil unserer Leute den Wölfen zum Fraß vorgeworfen und sich selbst geopfert hat, damit wir die Ernte vorbereiten konnten. Wir haben den Unfall mit dem Aufzug inszeniert, aber Ihr habt überlebt, dann hätte ich Euch fast an der Frachtroute erwischt, aber wieder hat sich das Blutgesponnene Netz eingemischt. Ihr hättet ein Teil von uns sein können ... ein Teil von etwas Großem, etwas Realem. Aber Ihr habt alles ruiniert. Alles."
languages.original_text: "Our old Magus appeared to you during the rite and led you on a false trail. He lulled you into a false sense of security by throwing a small portion of our forces to the wolves and sacrificing himself to buy time to prepare for the harvest. We orchestrated the elevator accident, but you survived, and then I almost intercepted you there on the freight line, but the Bloodspun Web interfered again. You could have been part of us — part of something great, something real. But you ruined everything. Everything."

languages.text: « Notre Magus vous est donc apparu pendant le rite pour vous mener sur une fausse piste. Il vous a donné un faux sentiment de sécurité en jetant une petite partie de nos forces tout droit dans la gueule du loup et en se sacrifiant pour nous donner le temps de préparer la récolte. C'est nous qui avons organisé le petit incident avec l'ascenseur, mais vous avez survécu. J'ai failli vous intercepter sur la ligne de fret, mais une fois de plus, la Toile de sang s'est interposée. Vous auriez pu faire partie de nous, de quelque chose de grand, de vrai. Mais vous avez tout gâché. Tout. »
languages.original_text: "Our old Magus appeared to you during the rite and led you on a false trail. He lulled you into a false sense of security by throwing a small portion of our forces to the wolves and sacrificing himself to buy time to prepare for the harvest. We orchestrated the elevator accident, but you survived, and then I almost intercepted you there on the freight line, but the Bloodspun Web interfered again. You could have been part of us — part of something great, something real. But you ruined everything. Everything."

languages.text: "Eski Magusumuz, ayinde karşına çıkarak seni yanlış bir izin peşinden gönderdi. Kuvvetlerimizin ufak bir kısmını kurtlara yem yaparak seni sahte bir güvenlik hissiyle kandırdı ve hasada hazırlık için zaman kazanmak adına kendini feda etti. Asansör kazasını biz planladık ancak sağ çıkmayı başardın. Ardından yük hattında neredeyse seni yakalıyordum ama Kanipi Ağı yine müdahale etti. Bizden biri olabilirdin. Yüce bir şeyin, hakiki bir şeyin parçası olabilirdin ama her şeyi mahvettin. Her şeyi..."
languages.original_text: "Our old Magus appeared to you during the rite and led you on a false trail. He lulled you into a false sense of security by throwing a small portion of our forces to the wolves and sacrificing himself to buy time to prepare for the harvest. We orchestrated the elevator accident, but you survived, and then I almost intercepted you there on the freight line, but the Bloodspun Web interfered again. You could have been part of us — part of something great, something real. But you ruined everything. Everything."
